summary: REQ-17 appears implemented: footer attribution updated to "by echu ❤️" and the heart icon between "with" and "using" was removed while keeping the caffeine.ai link present (per diff summary). However, the diff summary also indicates unrelated LandingPage Create Session flow/UI changes, which were explicitly out of scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Landing page Create Session UX change: after creating a session, UI shows a "Session created" confirmation and an explicit "Join session" button before entering chat (i.e., changes to session creation/joining flow).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state no changes to session creation/joining; only footer copy/icon update was requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (LandingPage.tsx summary: "Create Session shows ... 'Session created' confirmation, and explicit 'Join session' button before entering chat")
